EmailTemplate.name: SM-2019-03-08-Cloud Optimization Thank You.EMAIL-Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Gift Card for Completing the {{my.Survey Name:default=}} Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4fVAAQ]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4fVAAQ]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for completing our {{my.Survey Name:default=}} Survey, your insight is greatly appreciated! As a reward for your time, your $10 gift card is enclosed below.
Based on your responses, I think you might also like this on-demand webinar, AWS vs. Azure <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/on-demand-webinars/webinar-aws-vs-azure]]>.
Watch this webinar to learn about terminology, the compelling reasons behind certain key services, and hear real-life stories of how others have found what they are looking for when choosing between cloud providers.
Regards, Elizabeth
{{my.Gift 10:default=edit me}}
